description: Environment Setup — installs and configures development tools. Tracks what worked, what failed, alternative approaches, and contextual insights (versions, mirrors, package managers).

env_setup.description: Installs development tools and runtime environments. Tracks each attempt with what worked, what failed, and why. Remembers version constraints, fast mirrors, package manager preferences per machine.

setup_categories.tools: Build tools, package managers, CLI utilities

config.fallback_order: Try package managers first, then direct download, then build from source

universal_knowledge.principle: Always try the fastest install method first. Record EVERY attempt including failures — next incarnation benefits from knowing what NOT to try.
universal_knowledge.version_rule: MUST match production version. Do NOT install a newer major version as fallback without explicit user approval. PHP 7->8 and similar major jumps break things.
universal_knowledge.machine_context: Different machines have different package managers available. Record which are present on each machine.
universal_knowledge.failure_recording: Record EVERY failed attempt with: method tried, error message, duration, reason for failure. This prevents next incarnation from wasting time on the same dead ends.
universal_knowledge.windows_php7_lesson: As of 2026: winget has no PHP 7.x. Chocolatey may have old versions but needs admin. windows.php.net/downloads/releases/ throttles heavily (~3KB/s). SOLUTION: use windows.php.net/downloads/releases/archives/ instead — full speed (~1MB/s). XAMPP portable also works.
universal_knowledge.process_discipline: Record findings in team.json IMMEDIATELY after each discovery. Do not batch. Context compression loses unrecorded work. Every action should leave a trace.
universal_knowledge.version_mismatch_severity: Installing the wrong major version is worse than having no installation. A wrong version gives false confidence — tests pass locally but break in production. Always prefer 'no local version' over 'wrong local version' unless user approves the gap.
